items.summary: Debug the MediaGallery component's certificate tab to identify why certificates are not rendering despite photos working correctly after the previous fix
Verify that the useCertificates and useCertificate hooks properly handle the blob data format and convert it to displayable URLs using the same pattern that works for photos
Fix the MediaGallery component to properly render the certificates tab, ensuring that uploaded certificates display in the gallery grid with the same visual treatment as photos
Verify the backend getAllCertificates and getCertificate methods return data in the exact same format as getAllPhotos and getPhoto to ensure consistency in the data pipeline
